definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters

sentences.english: This practice would have reduced the likelihood of inbreeding, she added.
sentences.chinese: 她還補充說，這樣做可以降低近親繁殖機率。

sentences.english: The concern in setting a limit is the genetic risk of consanguinity.
sentences.chinese: 設定精子使用率上限是用來規避近親繁殖的風險的。

sentences.english: New cubs must be inbred further.
sentences.chinese: 新的幼崽必須進一步近親繁殖。

sentences.english: Moreover, comparing MHCs could be a proxy for comparing kinship, and thus help to prevent inbreeding.
sentences.chinese: 另外，比較MHC即比較親緣關係，能防止近親繁殖。
